name: Treasure Room Familiar

name: Nearby Kill Luck
description: 4% chance to gain +0.03 luck when killing enemies within 1.5 tiles of you.

name: Fortunate Spender
description: +1.5 luck for the current floor while you haven't purchased items.

Luck reduction doesn't apply during the Ascent.

name: Marquess Of Flies
description: Whenever you gain coins, 50% chance to spawn a blue fly if you have less than 20 blue flies.
Whenever a coin heals you, 20% chance to gain Hive Mind for the current room if you don't
have it.
Increase damage dealt by blue flies by 1% per coin you own, up to 50%.
-1% speed and tears per active blue fly.

name: Strange Coupon
description: Start with Coupon.
Whenever you gain charges with Coupon, 50% chance to nullify the gained charges.
After using Coupon a total of 4 times, replace it with Steam Sale.
Purchasing 4 items while holding Steam Sale removes it.

name: Blessed Pennies
description: Shops have a 25% chance to sell an additional penny trinket, at twice its regular price.
When defeating a floor's boss, if you took no damage in the rest of the floor, smelt your
currently held penny trinkets, if present.
Spawn a penny when a penny trinket gets smelted this way.
When hit, 20% chance to lose held penny trinkets (not smelted).

name: Voodoo Trick
description: Completing a floor without getting hit more than 3 times grants you Voodoo Head for the next floor.
Voodoo Head can no longer show up naturally.

name: Vanishing Coins Time
description: +0.04 seconds to vanishing coins' timer.

name: Coin Tears Chance
description: 2% chance for fired tears to be coin tears from Head of the Keeper.
If total chance is above 40%, Head of the Keeper can no longer show up.
Coin tears deal 10% increased damage against gilded monsters.

name: Gilded Monster Penny Drop
description: 2% chance for Gilded monsters to drop an additional non-vanishing penny on death.

name: Gilded Monster Luck

name: Gilded Monster Speed Buff

name: Gilded Monster Penny Trinket Upgrade

name: Voodoo Curse Room Nickel

name: Steam Sale Keep Chance
description: 8% chance to keep Steam Sale when purchasing more than 4 items while holding it.

name: Electrified Swarm
description: Start with a smelted Extension Cord.
Tears fired by locusts have a 33% chance to be electrified.
Extension Cord beams deal 33% less damage.

name: Close Keeper
description: Locusts follow you much more closely.
+2% damage received by enemies per locust near it, up to 20%.

name: Carrion Locusts
description: +1% to a random stat whenever a locust kills an enemy, up to +12% of each stat.
For every 20 enemies killed by locusts, gain a random smelted Locust trinket you
don't currently have.
Entering a floor halves your current bonuses and removes smelted Locust trinkets.

name: Great Devourer
description: You can now only have up to 1 locust.
Whenever you would have gained a locust, instead add +8% damage and speed to the existing locust,
up to a total 200%.
Double extension cord beam damage if it targets a locust.
Triple your total chance for locusts to fire tears, and these inherit an additional 40%
of your damage.
If Electrified Swarm is allocated, locust tears are always electrified.

name: Extension Cord Beam Damage
description: Extension Cord beams deal an additional 4% of your damage if they target a locust.

name: Extension Cord Beam Slow
description: 3% chance for Extension Cord beams to slow enemies for 2 seconds on hit if they target a locust.

name: Locust Tears
description: 1.5% chance for locusts to shoot a small tear towards enemies close to them whenever you shoot.
Locust tears deal a base 20% of your damage.

name: Locust Tear Damage
description: Locust tears gain an additional 3% of your damage.

name: Locust Lost Contact Tears
description: 4% chance for tears fired by locusts to be spectral and piercing.

name: Locust Kill Pickup Drop
description: 0.2% chance for enemies killed by locusts to drop an additional coin/key/bomb, up to twice

name: Locust Kill Tear Boost
description: +1% tears for 2 seconds when a locust kills an enemy.

name: Cricket Leg On Kill

description: +12% damage dealt by Tainted Forgotten while on the floor.
+12% damage dealt by Tainted Forgotten to enemies near Tainted Soul.
-20% damage dealt if neither of the above conditions is fulfilled.

description: Tainted Forgotten shoots bone tears towards Tainted Soul while on the ground, if there are
monsters in the room.
While holding Tainted Forgotten, fire bone tears towards nearby enemies instead.
Bone tears' rate of fire is based on your tears stat.
Bone tears deal 50% of your damage on hit.
Fired bone tears have a 50% chance of gaining homing if Tainted Forgotten is on the ground.

name: Magnetized Shell
description: Start with Strange Attractor.
-10% speed.

-1% damage and speed per blood charge past 20, up to -25%.

description: Lemegeton wisps take 60% reduced damage.
Lemegeton wisps deal 35% increased contact damage.
Fully heal a wisp when it kills an enemy with contact damage.
-0.03 luck per active wisp past 5.

name: Otherside Seeker
description: Start with 3 smelted Crystal Keys.
Defeating Mom without taking damage grants you an additional smelted Crystal Key.

name: Inherited Chaos
description: When entering a floor, spawn a Chaos wisp if you don't currently have one.
Chaos wisps receive 200% more damage when hit.
-3% all stats whenever a Chaos wisp is destroyed, up to -12%.

name: Red Heart Room Damage
description: +0.05% damage for the current room when picking up a red heart, up to +15%.

When entering a floor, remove all soul/black hearts.
Tainted Jacob now starts in his dead spirit state, and entering a floor no longer revives you.
Dark Esau no longer deals contact damage to you.

name: Wrathful Chains
description: When Dark Esau is unchained from Anima Sola, all non-boss enemies are slowed for 3 seconds.
Using Anima Sola while Dark Esau is present additionally chains another random enemy in the room.
Enemies chained by Anima Sola receive 15% more damage.
Hitting an enemy chained by Anima Sola deals 40% of the damage to other nearby enemies.

name: Spiritual Covenant
description: Hitting an enemy causes Dark Esau to target it if Tainted Jacob is in the dead spirit state.
Dark Esau's base contact damage is now 200% of your damage stat, capped at 40.

name: Dark Esau Proximity Buff
description: +1% speed and damage when near Dark Esau.
Buff lingers for 2 seconds when the condition is no longer met.

name: Dark Esau Damage
description: +1% damage dealt by Dark Esau to monsters.

name: Anima Sola Cooldown
description: -0.2 seconds to Anima Sola's cooldown.

name: Anima Sola Tears Buff
description: +0.05% tears for the current floor when killing an enemy chained by Anima Sola, up to +15%.

name: Eternal Heart Drop Conversion

name: Slowed Enemies Damage
description: Slowed enemies receive 1% more damage.

name: Anima Sola Duration
description: +1% to Anima Sola's chains duration.

name: Kinetic Vengeance

name: Shadowmeld

Shadowmeld creates a marked shadow at your current position.
Re-using Shadowmeld causes you to sink into the shadows then reappear at the marked shadow's
location.
While sinking or reappearing, and for 0.5 seconds afterwards, you can't be damaged.
Press the Drop key to remove placed markers.

name: Dark Arpeggio
description: Every 4 total seconds spent firing, your Siren Minions fire a homing tear that inflicts fear
on enemies hit.

name: Chromatic Blessing
description: When successfully summoning a familiar through Manifest Melody, gain stats based on the
used notes:
- Left: +0.5% speed
- Right: +0.5% tears
- Up: +0.5% damage
- Down: +0.5% range and luck
Each individual buff has a limit of 15%.

name: Grand Consonance
description: Whenever you gain a familiar, instead absorb its power and gain an effect based on the familiar.
-4% damage dealt to enemies for each damage-dealing familiar you obtain, up to -48%.

name: Song Of The Few
description: Start with a smelted Forgotten Lullaby.
Once you have at least 2 damage-dealing familiar items, 20% chance to lose a smelted
Forgotten Lullaby when obtaining more familiar items.
This chance increases by 15% per familiar item obtained past 3.

name: Feared Enemy Damage
description: Feared enemies receive 1% more damage.

name: Tear Burst On Feared Death
description: 0.5% chance for feared enemies to release 3-4 homing tears on death that cause fear.
These tears deal 4% of the killed monster's HP as damage on hit, minimum 3 damage.

name: Acrid Gaze
description: Every 1.5 total seconds spent firing, unleash a pulse that damages and fears nearby enemies
for 2 seconds.
Damage dealt by the pulse is 120% of your luck stat, up to 10.
+8% pulse size.

name: Siren Minion Damage
description: 1% more damage dealt by your Siren Minions.

name: Dark Arpeggio Tear Delay
description: -0.1 total seconds required for Siren Minions to fire the Dark Arpeggio tear.

name: Shadowmeld Explosion
description: 5% chance to cause a dark explosion when reappearing with Shadowmeld, dealing 100% of your

name: Shadowmeld Explosion Damage
description: Shadowmeld explosion deals an additional 8% of your damage.

name: Black Heart On Feared Kill
description: 1% chance to receive 1/2 a black heart when killing a feared enemy, if you have less than

name: Luck On Feared Kill
description: 2% chance to gain +0.02 luck when killing a feared enemy, up to a total +3.

3 black hearts, up to twice per room.

name: Luck On Feared Kill
description: 6% chance to gain +0.02 luck when killing a feared enemy, up to a total +3.

name: Soul Of The Siren
description: Allocate this to unlock Soul Of The Siren as a soul stone variant.
Requires Boss Rush and Hush completion marks on Tainted Siren.
Soul of the Siren: charm monsters in the room for 10 seconds. For the next 60 seconds,
gain 3 random baby familiars, a smelted Friendship Necklace, and charm monsters for
10 seconds when entering a room.

name: Arcane Astrolabe
description: Unlocks Astral Expeditions.
Once allocated, press the Allocate button to access the expeditions menu.
Access requires the currently selected character to be level 60+.

name: Sidereal Tree
description: Unlocks the Sidereal Tree.
Each character has their own Sidereal Tree progression.
Utilize Arcane Obols from Astral Expeditions to unlock new features and power for
the currently selected character.
Initially this tree applies exclusively to expedition runs, but further unlocks
allow applying its features to all runs.

name: Obol Exchange
description: Once allocated, press the Allocate button to convert 1 global SP into 10 Arcane Obols.

name: Astral Forge
description: Unlocks the Astral Forge and Astral Weapons.
Once allocated, press the Allocate button to access the forge menu.

name: Sidereal Vicinity
description: Sidereal tree travel node. Costs no global SP to allocate, and costs Arcane Obols instead.

name: Sidereal Region
description: Sidereal tree travel node. Costs no global SP to allocate, and costs Arcane Obols instead.

name: Sidereal Expanse
description: Sidereal tree travel node. Costs no global SP to allocate, and costs Arcane Obols instead.

name: Boss Astral Weapon Drop Rate
description: +7% chance for bosses to drop an Astral Weapon on death, up to 4 per room.
Above 100% total chance, roll for multiple weapon drops.

name: Astral Weapon Drops: Longswords
description: +7% chance for dropped Astral Weapons to be Longswords.

name: Astral Weapon Drops: Estocs
description: +7% chance for dropped Astral Weapons to be Estocs.

name: Astral Weapon Drops: Daggers
description: +7% chance for dropped Astral Weapons to be Daggers.

name: Astral Weapon Drops: Quickblades

name: Astral Weapon Drops: Axes

name: Astral Weapon Drops: Greataxes
description: +7% chance for dropped Astral Weapons to be Greataxes.

name: Astral Weapon Drops: Shortbows
description: +7% chance for dropped Astral Weapons to be Shortbows.

name: Astral Weapon Drops: Bows
description: +7% chance for dropped Astral Weapons to be Bows.

name: Astral Weapon Drops: Crossbows

description: +0.6% chance for dropped Astral Weapons to be Magic.

name: Ancient Astral Weapons
description: +0.1% chance for dropped Astral Weapons to be Ancient.

name: Sidereal Universalization
description: Sidereal tree effects can now affect normal, non-expedition runs.
Can't respec this node once allocated.

name: Sidereal Caches Chance Boost
description: When entering a new floor, +0.05% chance added to all Sidereal Cache sources from other nodes.
Does not apply during the Ascent.

name: Sidereal Caches - Challenge Rooms
description: 6% chance for a Sidereal Cache to drop when clearing a challenge room.

name: Sidereal Caches - Boss Room Clear
description: 5% chance for a Sidereal Cache to drop when clearing a boss room past the first floor.

name: Sidereal Caches - Regular Chests
description: 2% chance for regular chests to be replaced with a Sidereal Cache when spawned.
Affects up to 2 chests per room.

name: Sidereal Caches Key Consumption
description: 5% chance for Sidereal Caches to consume no keys when opened.

name: Sidereal Cache Replication
description: 2% chance for Sidereal Caches to drop an additional cache when opened, once per room.

name: Sidereal Cache Sacks
description: 2% chance for Sidereal Caches to additionally drop 1-2 sacks when opened.

name: Sidereal Cache Astral Weapons
description: 9% chance for Sidereal Caches to additionally drop a random Astral Weapon.
Above 100% total chance, roll for multiple weapon drops.

name: Boss Sparkling Stardust

name: Final Boss Ancient Stardust
description: +2% chance for Final Bosses to grant an additional Ancient Stardust on death.

name: Pre-honed Weapon Drops

This chance is applied once per allocated node of this type.

name: Timeless Bazaar
description: Once allocated, press the Allocate button to access the Timeless Bazaar Menu.
The Timeless Bazaar allows you to spend global SP and obols to purchase one-time items
to be added to the next run you start.

name: Bazaar Item Quality 0 to 1
description: 5% chance on Bazaar refresh to upgrade quality 0 items to quality 1.

name: Bazaar Item Quality 1 to 2
description: 3% chance on Bazaar refresh to upgrade quality 1 items to quality 2.

name: Bazaar Item Quality 2 to 3
description: 2% chance on Bazaar refresh to upgrade quality 2 items to quality 3.

name: Bazaar Additional Offerings

name: Bazaar Selection Keeping

name: Bazaar Devil Items

name: Bazaar Angel Items

name: Bazaar Refresh

name: Bazaar Refresh Keeper

name: Champion Monster XP

name: Champion Chest Limit

name: Spiked Chest Replacement
description: 2% chance to replace spiked and mimic chests with regular chests.

name: Spiked Chest Replacement
description: 6% chance to replace spiked and mimic chests with regular chests.

name: Charged Key Conversion
description: 0.5% chance to convert dropped keys into charged keys if you have any active item that's
not fully charged.

name: Charged Key Conversion
description: 1.5% chance to convert dropped keys into charged keys if you have any active item that's
not fully charged.

name: Throwable Bomb Clear Reward
description: 0.4% chance to additionally drop a throwable bomb when clearing a room.

name: Throwable Bomb Clear Reward
description: 1% chance to additionally drop a throwable bomb when clearing a room.

name: Deadly Sin Key On Death
description: 3% chance for Deadly Sin minibosses to drop a key on death.
Double the chance for Super Deadly Sin versions.

name: Deadly Sin Battery On Death
description: 4% chance for Deadly Sin minibosses to drop a lil battery on death.
Double the chance for Super Deadly Sin versions.

name: Deadly Sin Key On Death
description: 9% chance for Deadly Sin minibosses to drop a key on death.
Double the chance for Super Deadly Sin versions.

name: Dono Machine Restore On Entrance
description: When first entering a shop room, 2% chance to restore the Donation Machine if it's jammed.

name: Dono Machine Restore On Entrance
description: When first entering a shop room, 6% chance to restore the Donation Machine if it's jammed.

name: Dono Machine Restore On Purchase
description: In shop rooms, 2% chance to restore the Donation Machine after purchasing any item worth
at least 15 coins, if it's jammed.

name: Dono Machine Purchase Restoration Price
description: -1 coin price threshold for Donation Machine restoration on purchase.

name: Dono Machine Restore On Purchase
description: In shop rooms, 6% chance to restore the Donation Machine after purchasing any item worth
at least 15 coins, if it's jammed.

name: Generosity In Steps
description: Donation Machine always jams after donating 10 coins.
Purchasing any shop item restores a jammed Donation Machine.

name: Boss Rush Door Timer Increase
description: +5 seconds to the total time limit for the Boss Rush door to open.

name: Boss Rush Door Timer Increase
description: +10 seconds to the total time limit for the Boss Rush door to open.

name: Beast-hunter's Rush
description: Triple the additional seconds given for the Boss Rush door to open.
-3 seconds to the total time limit for the Boss Rush door to open whenever you get hit.

name: Hush Door Timer Increase
description: +5 seconds to the total time limit for Hush's door to open.

name: Hush Door Timer Increase
description: +10 seconds to the total time limit for Hush's door to open.

name: Boss Clear Locked Chest
description: 2% chance to spawn a locked chest after clearing the boss room.
Only 1 chest may spawn from effects of this type, once per floor.

name: Boss Clear Red Chest
description: 2% chance to spawn a red chest after clearing the boss room.
Only 1 chest may spawn from effects of this type, once per floor.

name: Boss Clear Stone Chest
description: 2% chance to spawn a stone chest after clearing the boss room.
Only 1 chest may spawn from effects of this type, once per floor.

name: Giga Bomb On Troll Disarm
description: When disarming a troll bomb, 1% chance for the resulting bomb pickup to be a giga bomb.

name: Giga Bomb On Troll Disarm
description: When disarming a troll bomb, 4% chance for the resulting bomb pickup to be a giga bomb.

name: Dark Expertise
description: Reduce Dark Arts' cooldown by 0.5 seconds per non-boss enemy hit with it.
Reduce Dark Arts' cooldown by 1 second per boss enemy hit with it.
+3 seconds to Dark Arts' cooldown.

name: Sidereal Cache Starcursed Jewels
description: 3% chance for Sidereal Caches to additionally drop a Starcursed Jewel when opened.

name: Donation Machine Stat Boost
description: +0.1% to a random stat every 5 coins given to the Donation machine, up to 5 times
per floor.

name: More Boss Rush Waves
description: +1 boss rush waves.

name: Less Boss Rush Waves
description: -1 boss rush waves.

name: Beggar Help XP
description: Gain +50 xp when fully helping any beggar (teleports away).

name: Shell Game XP
description: Gain +6 xp when spending coins on shell games, up to 50 times per floor.

name: Slot Machine XP
description: Gain +3 xp when spending coins on slot machines, up to 50 times per floor.

name: Fortune Machine XP
description: Gain between 0 and 7 xp when spending coins on fortune machines, up to 50 times per floor.

name: Flawless XP
description: +2% xp gain while you haven't taken damage in the current floor.

name: Character SP Conversion
description: Once allocated, press the Allocate button to convert 1 character SP into 1 global SP.

name: Dynamic Tree Mode
description: If you begin a run with this node allocated, changes to the tree will be applied to that run
in real time.
Only applies to node allocations/respecs.
Allows progressing multiple Astral Expedition objectives within the same run.

name: Bazaar's Permanence Blessing
description: Your purchased items from the Timeless Bazaar last one additional run.
The Timeless Bazaar now takes twice as long to refresh automatically (from run wins/losses).

name: Ancient Weapon Bounties
description: Allocate to unlock Ancient Weapon Bounties.
This allows you to spend obols to generate a bounty for a chosen weapon type.
Bounties provide a series of objectives you need to complete, and reward a random
Ancient weapon of the chosen type on completion.

name: Core Crimson Node
description: Allocate to choose any medium node from this character tree.
Gain the effects of the chosen node while allocated.

name: Universal Crimson Node
description: Allocate to choose any medium node from the global skill tree.
Gain the effects of the chosen node while allocated.

name: Divergent Crimson Node
description: Allocate to choose any medium node from another character's tree.
Gain the effects of the chosen node while allocated.

name: Astral Weapon Drops: Gauntlets
description: +7% chance for dropped Astral Weapons to be Gauntlets.

name: Astral Weapon Drops: Great Maces
description: +7% chance for dropped Astral Weapons to be Great Maces.

name: Description Box Style
description: Press Allocate to switch the display style for node description boxes.

name: Save Backups Addon
description: No Save Backups Addon detected!
Be warned that if data loss occurs, it will be permanent.
The addon allows the automatic creation of mod save backups for safety. If data loss is
detected, a prompt will appear when opening the tree that allows you to select a backup to
try and load.
You can find a download for the addon in the mod's workshop description page.
This node will disappear once the addon is installed and detected.
